writer.name: 托里·扬科维奇 Branimir Tori Jankovic

director.name: 托里·扬科维奇 Branimir Tori Jankovic

language: 塞尔维亚-克罗地亚语 Serbo-Croatian
introduction: It is the year in 1941. WWII. A little place in the heart of Serbia suffered from the German punitive expedition, which is passed through small place. Only the children stayed who did not even know what war...German boot while they did not enter in the place. Between the jokes and mischief, Children are organized, organize the work and life of the village....But the worst... planned and the end of organized attacks on the Germans, which will lead to tragedy. Written by krule88
